faq.question: Do I need to modify my containers?
faq.answer: No. The sidecar pattern means zero changes to your existing container images or job logic.

faq.question: What Kubernetes versions are supported?
faq.answer: Kubernetes 1.19+. Works with EKS, GKE, AKS, and self-hosted clusters.

faq.question: How does anomaly detection work?
faq.answer: Saturn uses Welford's algorithm to maintain running statistics (mean, variance) and detects outliers using Z-Score analysis when duration exceeds 3 standard deviations.

faq.question: Can I monitor existing CronJobs?
faq.answer: Yes. Export your existing CronJob manifest and use it as the basis for the Helm values. The chart wraps your job configuration.

faq.question: What happens if Saturn API is down?
faq.answer: Your jobs continue running normally. The sidecar retries pings with exponential backoff and never blocks your main container.

faq.question: How much does it cost?
faq.answer: Free tier: 10 monitors. Pro tier: $29/mo for 50 monitors. Enterprise: custom pricing for unlimited monitors.
